name: NeoBlackTiger
description:
A proof of concept of a free / fan port of Black Tiger for the Neo.Geo.
(also known as Black Dragon)

-=- Goals:  -=-
improve controls, camera,  graphics and animations
better gameplay balance and experience
---=====---

If u want to help development and make this game a real thing for the Neo.Geo please DONATE! 

You can also directly get access to advanced content such as dev tools and / or more recent demos (when/if available) through early access buttons.

Let me know what you think guys, all suggestions are welcome!! :)

You can also contact me through discord : https://discord.gg/MqpZZSV
